item.name: db[current_scn]
item.description: system change delta, useful for activity comparisons

item.name: db[last_patch_hist]
item.description: last patch action in the registry

item.name: zbxdb[connect,status]
item.description: 0 is OK, all others is ERROR_CODE for connect

trigger_prototype.name: asmVG {#ASMVOL} loopt binnen 14d vol
trigger_prototype.description: gebaseerd op de gegevens van de laatste 14 of van de laatste 7 dagen lijkt dit asm volume vol te lopen binnen 14 dagen.

trigger_prototype.name: acfs fs {#ACFS_FS} loopt binnen 14d vol
trigger_prototype.description: gebaseerd op de gegevens van de laatste 14 of 7 dagen lijkt dit fs vol te lopen binnen 14 dagen.

trigger_prototype.name: arl_dest[{#INST_NAME},{#ARL_DEST}] ! VALID
trigger_prototype.description: ARL destination not in (VALID(0) and DEFERRED(1))

trigger_prototype.name: db{#PDB} in mount mode
trigger_prototype.description: PDB is mounted

item_prototype.name: dgrp[{#DGRP},leftfree30d]
item_prototype.description: ruimte om vol te lopen gebaseerd op laatste 30 dagen.

item_prototype.name: dgrp[{#DGRP},leftfree180d]
item_prototype.description: tijd die nog rest om vol te lopen, gebaseerd op laatste half jaar.

trigger_prototype.name: dg[{#DGRP},pctfree] < {$ZBXDB_ASM_PCTFREE_HIGH}
trigger_prototype.description: low space and changed in last week

trigger_prototype.name: dg[{#DGRP},pctfree] < {$ZBXDB_ASM_PCTFREE_INFO}
trigger_prototype.description: low space and changing

trigger_prototype.name: dg[{#DGRP},pctfree] < {$ZBXDB_ASM_PCTFREE_WARN}
trigger_prototype.description: pct free < warning level and current pct free < minimum pct free of a week ago

trigger_prototype.name: dg[{#DGRP},pctfree] == 0
trigger_prototype.description: game over

trigger_prototype.expression: {template zbxDB:dgrp[{#DGRP},pctfree].timeleft(14d,,0)} < 100d and {template zbxDB:dgrp[{#DGRP},pctfree].timeleft(14d,,0)} < 2d or {template zbxDB:dgrp[{#DGRP},pctfree].timeleft(14d,,0)} >= 100d and ( {template zbxDB:dgrp[{#DGRP},pctfree].timeleft(7d,,0)} < 100d and {template zbxDB:dgrp[{#DGRP},pctfree].timeleft(7d,,0)} < 2d or {template zbxDB:dgrp[{#DGRP},pctfree].timeleft(7d,,0)} >= 100d and ( {template zbxDB:dgrp[{#DGRP},pctfree].timeleft(1d,,0)} < 100d and {template zbxDB:dgrp[{#DGRP},pctfree].timeleft(1d,,0)} < 2d or {template zbxDB:dgrp[{#DGRP},pctfree].timeleft(1d,,0)} >= 100d and ( {template zbxDB:dgrp[{#DGRP},pctfree].timeleft(6h,,0)} < 100d and {template zbxDB:dgrp[{#DGRP},pctfree].timeleft(6h,,0)} < 2d)))
trigger_prototype.name: dg[{#DGRP} loopt binnen 2d vol
trigger_prototype.description: poging om op tijd te waarschuwen ondanks zaagtandjes. als gebaseerd op laatste 14d < 2d of als laatste 7d < 2d of als laatste 1d < 2d of als laatste 6h < 2d tijd geeft komt de trigger.

trigger_prototype.name: dg[{#DGRP} loopt binnen 14d vol
trigger_prototype.description: poging om op tijd te waarschuwen ondanks zaagtandjes. als gebaseerd op laatste 14d < 14d of als laatste 7d < 14d tijd geeft komt de trigger.

dependency.name: dg[{#DGRP} loopt binnen 2d vol
dependency.expression: {template zbxDB:dgrp[{#DGRP},pctfree].timeleft(14d,,0)} < 100d and {template zbxDB:dgrp[{#DGRP},pctfree].timeleft(14d,,0)} < 2d or {template zbxDB:dgrp[{#DGRP},pctfree].timeleft(14d,,0)} >= 100d and ( {template zbxDB:dgrp[{#DGRP},pctfree].timeleft(7d,,0)} < 100d and {template zbxDB:dgrp[{#DGRP},pctfree].timeleft(7d,,0)} < 2d or {template zbxDB:dgrp[{#DGRP},pctfree].timeleft(7d,,0)} >= 100d and ( {template zbxDB:dgrp[{#DGRP},pctfree].timeleft(1d,,0)} < 100d and {template zbxDB:dgrp[{#DGRP},pctfree].timeleft(1d,,0)} < 2d or {template zbxDB:dgrp[{#DGRP},pctfree].timeleft(1d,,0)} >= 100d and ( {template zbxDB:dgrp[{#DGRP},pctfree].timeleft(6h,,0)} < 100d and {template zbxDB:dgrp[{#DGRP},pctfree].timeleft(6h,,0)} < 2d)))

item_prototype.name: expu[{#PDB},{#USERNAME},expiring]
item_prototype.description: days left before expiration takes place

trigger_prototype.name: account expiration {#PDB} {#USERNAME} in 1 week
trigger_prototype.description: and {template zbxDB:expu[{#PDB},{#USERNAME},expiring].nodata(2h)}=0

trigger_prototype.name: account expiration {#PDB} {#USERNAME} in 2 weeks
trigger_prototype.description:
acount to expire within 14 days, nodata when password has been changed.
and {template zbxDB:expu[{#PDB},#USERNAME},expiring].nodata(2h)}=0

trigger_prototype.name: account expiration {#PDB} {#USERNAME} in 5 days
trigger_prototype.description:
when password is reset, the user is no longer reported so the reset error should be on nodata
and {template zbxDB:expu[{#PDB},{#USERNAME},expiring].nodata(2h)}=0

item_prototype.name: inst[{#INST_NAME},version]
item_prototype.description: version info is only collected at connection time (minutes=0) so only a few samples.

item_prototype.name: p_ts[{#PDB},{#TS_NAME},pctfreeMAX,timeleft1d]
item_prototype.description: time left to depletion based on last day of measurements

item_prototype.name: p_ts[{#PDB},{#TS_NAME},pctfreeMAX,timeleft7d]
item_prototype.description: time to depletion based on last week of measurements

item_prototype.name: p_ts[{#PDB},{#TS_NAME},pctfreeMAX,timeleft14d]
item_prototype.description: time to depletion based on last 14 days of measurements

item_prototype.name: p_ts[{#PDB},{#TS_NAME},pctfreeMAX]
item_prototype.description: same as pctfree but based on max filesize

trigger_prototype.name: p_ts[{#PDB},{#TS_NAME},pctfreeMAX]< {$ZBXDB_TS_HIGH}
trigger_prototype.description: TS grows since a week and hits HIGH alert treshhold

trigger_prototype.name: p_ts[{#PDB},{#TS_NAME},pctfreeMAX]< {$ZBXDB_TS_WARN}
trigger_prototype.description: TS is growing since last week and hits WARN level

trigger_prototype.name: p_ts[{#PDB},{#TS_NAME}] loopt binnen 5d vol
trigger_prototype.description: loopt de tablespace binnen 5 dagen vol? gebaseerd op laatste 14 dagen, laatste 7 dagen of laatste dag.

trigger_prototype.expression: {template zbxDB:p_ts[{#PDB},{#TS_NAME},pctfreeMAX].timeleft(14d,,0)} < 100d and {template zbxDB:p_ts[{#PDB},{#TS_NAME},pctfreeMAX].timeleft(14d,,0)} < 14d or {template zbxDB:p_ts[{#PDB},{#TS_NAME},pctfreeMAX].timeleft(14d,,0)} >= 100d and ( {template zbxDB:p_ts[{#PDB},{#TS_NAME},pctfreeMAX].timeleft(7d,,0)} < 100d and {template zbxDB:p_ts[{#PDB},{#TS_NAME},pctfreeMAX].timeleft(7d,,0)} < 7d or {template zbxDB:p_ts[{#PDB},{#TS_NAME},pctfreeMAX].timeleft(7d,,0)} >= 100d and ( {template zbxDB:p_ts[{#PDB},{#TS_NAME},pctfreeMAX].timeleft(1d,,0)} < 100d and {template zbxDB:p_ts[{#PDB},{#TS_NAME},pctfreeMAX].timeleft(1d,,0)} < 1d))
trigger_prototype.name: p_ts[{#PDB},{#TS_NAME}] loopt binnen 14d vol
trigger_prototype.description: gebaseerd op data van laatste 14 dagen maar ook op de laatste 7 dagen waarbij dan getriggerred wordt als minder dan 7 dagen over zijn en nog eens op de laatste dag waarbij de prognose minder dan een dag te gaan wordt getest.

trigger_prototype.name: p_ts[{#PDB},{#TS_NAME}] loopt vol
trigger_prototype.description: vrije ruimte neemt af, tijd tot vollopen neemt af en is kleiner dan 4d volgens laatste dag aan metingen

discovery_rule.name: rman.lld
discovery_rule.description: rman backup info by object_type from v$rman_status

trigger_prototype.name: rman bkup {#OBJ_TYPE} {$ZBXDB_BKUP_AGE_FACTOR} * older than usual avg
trigger_prototype.description: try to report when last backup far over average age. Age is taken from last 30 days. Set macro {$ZBXDB_BKUP_AGE_FACTOR} to 0 if backups are not important for the given host

trigger_prototype.name: rman[{#OBJ_TYPE}].last bkup failed
trigger_prototype.description:
set macro {$ZBXDB_BKUP_AGE_FACTOR} to 0 when backups are not of any importance.
Trigger fires immdiatly, not sent to standby: not fatal

trigger_prototype.name: rman[{#OBJ_TYPE}].last bkup OUDer {$ZBXDB_BKUP_MAX_INCR_AGE}
trigger_prototype.description: backups ouder dan {$ZBXDB_BKUP_MAX_INCR_AGE} ..... wat klopt er niet?

item_prototype.name: service[{#PDB},{#INST_NAME},{#SERVICE_NAME},sess]
item_prototype.description: Sessions counted by database, instance, service.

item_prototype.name: t_ts[{#PDB},{#TS_NAME},pctfreeMAX]
item_prototype.description: same as pctfree but based on max filesize

item_prototype.name: u_ts[{#PDB},{#TS_NAME},pctfreeMAX]
item_prototype.description: same as pctfree but based on max filesize

trigger_prototype.name: u_ts[{#PDB},{#TS_NAME},pctfreeMAX]< {$ZBXDB_TS_HIGH}
trigger_prototype.description: undo tablespace almost FULL

trigger_prototype.name: u_ts[{#PDB},{#TS_NAME},pctfreeMAX]< {$ZBXDB_TS_WARN}
trigger_prototype.description: undo tablespace loopt bijna vol

discovery_rule.name: zbxdb queries
discovery_rule.description: queries found in the zbxdb checks file

item_prototype.name: query[{#SECTION},{#KEY},ela]
item_prototype.description: part of self health check; how long takes processing of a check section?

item_prototype.name: query[{#SECTION},{#KEY},status]
item_prototype.description: status of query execution, part of self health check 0 == OK, all others ERROR_CODE from database

trigger_prototype.name: zbxdb[query,{#SECTION},{#KEY}] failed
trigger_prototype.description: could be due to anything, query syntax, lost connection, permissions etc.

discovery_rule.name: zbxdb sections
discovery_rule.description: sections found in the checks parameter file, kind of self discovery

item_prototype.name: section[query,{#SECTION},,ela]
item_prototype.description: time taken to process 1 section of checks

trigger.name: fra loop snel vol(<4h)
trigger.description: aan de hand van de gegevens van afgelopen 6 uur is de schatting dat fra binnen 4 uur volloopt

trigger.name: fra zit vol
trigger.description: fra heeft minder dan 2% bruikbare ruimte

trigger.name: no SCN increase since {$ZBXDB_SCN_INCREASE}
trigger.description: SCN's are not increasing since {$ZBXDB_SCN_INCREASE}. Is this a standby database? Check redo transport and redo apply.

trigger.name: zbxdb Connect nodata {HOSTNAME} since {$ZBXDB_NODATA}
trigger.description: no info received during a long period

trigger.name: zbxdb Connect {HOSTNAME} failed
trigger.description: Connect to database failed. Could be any thing from listener down to database down, account locked etc.
